member.name: T:Enterprise.Multitenancy.Abstractions.IGetTenantId
member.summary: Implementations know how to retrieve the tenant ID. For ASP.NET Core applications, this is typically retrieved from the current request.

member.name: T:Enterprise.Multitenancy.Exceptions.TenantIdNotFoundException
member.summary: This exception is thrown when a request to get a tenant ID has been made, and it can't be resolved. This is typically only if the application has multi-tenancy enabled.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Multitenancy.Options.MultitenancyConfigOptions.MultiTenancyEnabled
member.summary: Determines if multi tenancy related services are registered. If this is not enabled, the application will fail when requests for any of these services are made.

member.name: P:Enterprise.Multitenancy.Options.MultitenancyConfigOptions.TenantIdRequired
member.summary: Determines if a will be thrown if the tenant ID cannot be located (when requested).
